Salinas.Rancho Las Salinas:
Rancho Las Salinas also called El Tucho was a four-square-league (17,713.6-acre (71.684 km2)) Spanish land concession in the Salinas Valley, in present day Monterey County, California.
It was given in 1795 to Antonio Aceves and Antonio Romero. A 4,428.4-acre (17.921 km2) Mexican land grant was made to Gabriel Espinosa by Mexican governor Nicolás Gutiérrez in 1839.
